name: httpc-comp6461
description: httpc is a curl-like application but supports HTTP protocol only.

scripts.post: npm run prepare && node build/src/index.js -p 80 post -h Content-Type:application/json http://httpbin.org/post -d
scripts.postByFile: npm run prepare && node build/src/index.js -p 80 post -h Content-Type:application/json -f C:\projects\node-httpc\input.json http://httpbin.org/post
scripts.redirect: npm run prepare && node build/src/index.js get http://httpbin.org:80/status/301
